title: The settings window is to tall (v1.78.2.2932)
author: TByte007
body_snippet:
On a smaller laptop screen (768 px height) the buttons are barely visible: 
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/d13883a0-05da-4910-9ae4-266bbd5f963d)

Best regards and thank you for your work!
